LanguageData.BedPan.label: bed pan
LanguageData.BedPan.description: A receptacle used by a bedridden patient for urine and faeces.
LanguageData.Biosolids.label: biosolids
LanguageData.Biosolids.description: When properly treated and processed, sewage sludge becomes biosolids that offer a small boost to terrain fertility. Useful for harsh environments with limited space to grow. Biosolids also produce a large boost to the fertility of sand which can make it fertile when combined with irrigation.
LanguageData.FecalSludge.label: fecal sludge
LanguageData.FecalSludge.description: A barrel filled with fecal sludge. Can be dumped, burned, or composted into biosolids.
